text: Bakhurebanga amalwa nende (okhubaya) isimbi, Boola mbu; “khulimwo nende obubii obukhongo nende obulayi khubandu, ne obubii bwabio nobukhoongo muno okhushila obulayi bwabio. Ne bakhurebanga mbu nishina shiabarusia? Boola mbu; “eshiburirire” endio nilwa Nyasaye amufunulila tsinyaali tsitsie kho munyoole okhupara
